name: Jocelyn Warner
biography: Warner received her BA in Textile design from Camberwell School of Arts & Crafts and an MA in computer-aided design and digital printing for textiles from Central St. Martin’s.  After graduating, she founded her own design studio where she handprinted fabrics for her scarf collection. Warner began using digital technology to expand her range of patterns and designs. She launched her brand in 1999 with hand screenprinted wallpapers. Her process begins with observations of nature and later sketching.
